languages.text: "Ну что, дармоеды, по приказу Лорд-капитана некоторые из вас будут учиться писать и читать".
"Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."
languages.original_text: "Ну что, дармоеды, по приказу Лорд-капитана некоторые из вас будут учиться писать и читать".

traits.locale_text: "Listen here, slackers. The Lord Captain has decreed that some of you must be taught reading and writing."
"Listen here, slackers. The Lord Captain has decreed that some of you must be taught reading and writing."

"Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi bien, les tire-au-flanc : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a décrété que certains d'entre vous allaient apprendre à lire et à écrire. »
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-moi bien, les tire-au-flanc : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a décrété que certains d'entre vous allaient apprendre à lire et à écrire. »

languages.text: «Atención, so vagos: {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha decretado que algunos de vosotros debéis aprender a leer y escribir».
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

traits.locale_text: «Atención, so vagos: {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha decretado que algunos de vosotros debéis aprender a leer y escribir».

languages.text: 「よく聞け、怠け者ども。ロード・キャプテンは、お前達の何人かに読み書きを教えるとお決めになられた」
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

traits.locale_text: 「よく聞け、怠け者ども。ロード・キャプテンは、お前達の何人かに読み書きを教えるとお決めになられた」

languages.text: “都给我听好，你们这群懒虫。舰长大人下令，说要教你们之中一部分人学习读书写字。”
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

traits.locale_text: “都给我听好，你们这群懒虫。舰长大人下令，说要教你们之中一部分人学习读书写字。”

languages.text: "Hört her, Ihr Drückeberger: Der Lord Captain hat bestimmt, dass einige von Euch Lesen und Schreiben lernen sollen."
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."

traits.locale_text: "Hört her, Ihr Drückeberger: Der Lord Captain hat bestimmt, dass einige von Euch Lesen und Schreiben lernen sollen."

languages.text: "Kulak verin aylaklar. Lord Kaptan ferman buyurdu, birkaçınıza okuma yazma öğretilecek."
languages.original_text: "Listen here, slackers: the Lord Captain has decreed that some of you should be taught reading and writing."
